sentences.en: Everywhere was tumult, exultation , deafening and maniacal bewilderment , astounding noise , yet furious dumb - show.
sentences.cn: 到处是骚动 、 兴奋 、 令人耳聋的疯狂的混乱,令人震惊的呼喊, 却也有激怒的哑剧场面.

sentences.en: He was almost maniacal in his pursuit of sporting records.
sentences.cn: 他近乎发疯般地追求着打破体育纪录。

sentences.en: I'm a maniacal perfectionist. And if I weren't , I wouldn't have this company.
sentences.cn: 我是个狂热的完美主义者, 否则我就打造不出自己的公司.

sentences.en: Julian Robertson was maniacal on the importance of management:'Have you done your work on management?
sentences.cn: 朱利安·罗伯森执迷于管理的重要性: ‘ 你在管理方面做工作了 吗 ?’

sentences.en: Let them do the idiotic and maniacal hooting for men.
sentences.cn: 让它们为人类作白痴似的狂人嚎叫.

sentences.en: None of this excuses his egregious, almost maniacal, tactics and his total insensity to our necessities.
sentences.cn: 这些都不能开脱他那种极端的, 近乎疯狂的策略,以及他对我们的需要全不照顾的态度.

sentences.en: She is hunched forward over the wheel with a maniacal expression.
sentences.cn: 她弓身伏在方向盘前，表情像疯了一样。

trans.tran_en: behaving as if you are crazy
